            if (!tbody) return;
            
            // íì¬ í ì ë ¬ ìí íì¸
            const currentState = weekdayTeamSortState[teamName] || 0;
            weekdayTeamSortState = {}; // ë¤ë¥¸ í ì ë ¬ ìí ì´ê¸°í
            
            const nextState = (currentState + 1) % 3;
            weekdayTeamSortState[teamName] = nextState;
            
            const rows = Array.from(tbody.querySelectorAll('tr'));
            
            // íì¼ì±ì , ì£¼ë§ì±ì  í ì ì¸íê³  ìì¼ íë§ ì ë ¬
            const dayRows = rows.filter(row => {
                const firstCell = row.querySelector('td');
                return firstCell && !firstCell.textContent.includes('ì±ì ');
            });
            
            const summaryRows = rows.filter(row => {
                const firstCell = row.querySelector('td');
                return firstCell && firstCell.textContent.includes('ì±ì ');
            });
            
            if (nextState === 0) {
                // ê¸°ë³¸ ìì (ì~ì¼)
                const dayOrder = ['ììì¼', 'íìì¼', 'ììì¼', 'ëª©ìì¼', 'ê¸ìì¼', 'í ìì¼', 'ì¼ìì¼'];
                dayRows.sort((a, b) => {
                    const dayA = a.querySelector('td').textContent.trim();
                    const dayB = b.querySelector('td').textContent.trim();
                    return dayOrder.indexOf(dayA) - dayOrder.indexOf(dayB);
                });
            } else {
                // í ì»¬ë¼ ì°¾ê¸°
                const teamHeaders = document.querySelectorAll('#weekdayTable th');
                let teamIndex = -1;
                
                teamHeaders.forEach((header, index) => {
                    if (header.onclick && header.onclick.toString().includes(teamName)) {
                        teamIndex = index;
                    }
                });
                
                if (teamIndex !== -1) {
                    dayRows.sort((a, b) => {
                        const cellA = a.cells[teamIndex];
                        const cellB = b.cells[teamIndex];
                        
                        if (!cellA || !cellB) return 0;
                        
                        // ì¹ë¥  ì¶ì¶ - ìì¼ë³ íì´ë¸ íì: "ì¹-í¨-ë¬´ (ì¹ë¥ )" 
                        const textA = cellA.textContent || cellA.innerText || '';
                        const textB = cellB.textContent || cellB.innerText || '';
                        
                        // ê´í¸ ìì ì¹ë¥  ì¶ì¶ (ì: "2-1-0 (0.667)" â 0.667)
                        const winRateA = parseFloat(textA.match(/\(([0-9.]+)\)/)?.[1] || '0');
                        const winRateB = parseFloat(textB.match(/\(([0-9.]+)\)/)?.[1] || '0');
                        
                        
                        if (nextState === 1) {
                            return winRateB - winRateA; // ì²« ë²ì§¸ í´ë¦­: ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì (ëì ì¹ë¥ ë¶í°)
                        } else {
                            return winRateA - winRateB; // ë ë²ì§¸ í´ë¦­: ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì (ë®ì ì¹ë¥ ë¶í°)
                        }
                    });
                }
            }
            
            // ì ë ¬ë íë¤ì ë¤ì ì¶ê°
            tbody.innerHTML = '';
            dayRows.forEach(row => tbody.appendChild(row));
            summaryRows.forEach(row => tbody.appendChild(row));
        };
        
        // ìì¼ë³ ì¹ë¥  ì ì ë ¬ í¨ì (3ë¨ê³: ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì â ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì â ìëìì)
        let weekdayRateSortState = {}; // ìì¼ë³ ì ë ¬ ìí
        let originalWeekdayTeamOrder = []; // ìë í ìì ì ì¥
        
        window.sortWeekdayByRate = function(dayKey) {
            const tbody = document.querySelector('#weekdayTable tbody');
            if (!tbody) return;
            
            // íì¬ ìí íì¸ ë° ë¤ì ìíë¡ ì í
            const currentState = weekdayRateSortState[dayKey] || 0;
            const nextState = (currentState + 1) % 3; // 0: ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì, 1: ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì, 2: ìëìì
            
            // ë¤ë¥¸ ìì¼ ìíë§ ì´ê¸°í (íì¬ ìì¼ ì ì¸)
            Object.keys(weekdayRateSortState).forEach(key => {
                if (key !== dayKey) {
                    delete weekdayRateSortState[key];
                }
            });
            weekdayRateSortState[dayKey] = nextState;
            
            const rows = Array.from(tbody.querySelectorAll('tr'));
            
            // íì¼ì±ì , ì£¼ë§ì±ì  í ì ì¸íê³  ìì¼ íë§ ì ë ¬
            const dayRows = rows.filter(row => {
                const firstCell = row.querySelector('td');
                return firstCell && !firstCell.textContent.includes('ì±ì ');
            });
            
            const summaryRows = rows.filter(row => {
                const firstCell = row.querySelector('td');
                return firstCell && firstCell.textContent.includes('ì±ì ');
            });
            
            // ìë ìì ì ì¥ (ì²« ë²ì§¸ í¸ì¶ ììë§)
            if (originalWeekdayTeamOrder.length === 0) {
                const thead = document.querySelector('#weekdayTable thead');
                if (thead) {
                    const headerRow = thead.querySelector('tr');
                    if (headerRow) {
                        const teamHeaders = Array.from(headerRow.querySelectorAll('th')).slice(1);
                        originalWeekdayTeamOrder = teamHeaders.map((th, index) => ({
                            index: index,
                            teamName: th.textContent.trim()
                        }));
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // í´ë¹ ìì¼ì í ì°¾ê¸°
            const dayNames = ['ììì¼', 'íìì¼', 'ììì¼', 'ëª©ìì¼', 'ê¸ìì¼', 'í ìì¼', 'ì¼ìì¼'];
            const dayKeys = ['ì', 'í', 'ì', 'ëª©', 'ê¸', 'í ', 'ì¼'];
            const dayIndex = dayKeys.indexOf(dayKey);
            const dayName = dayNames[dayIndex];
            
            const targetRowIndex = dayRows.findIndex(row => {
                const firstCell = row.querySelector('td');
                return firstCell && firstCell.textContent.trim() === dayName;
            });
            
            if (targetRowIndex === -1) return;
            
            let teamRates = [];
            
            if (nextState === 2) {
                // ìë ììë¡ ë³µì
                teamRates = originalWeekdayTeamOrder.map((originalIndex, currentIndex) => ({
                    rate: 0, // ìë ììììë ì¹ë¥  ë¶íì
                    originalIndex: originalIndex
                }));
            } else {
                // í´ë¹ ìì¼ì íë³ ì¹ë¥  ë°ì´í° ìì§
                const targetRow = dayRows[targetRowIndex];
                const cells = Array.from(targetRow.querySelectorAll('td')).slice(1); // ì²« ë²ì§¸ ìì¼ ë¼ë²¨ ì ì¸
                
                cells.forEach((cell, index) => {
                    const text = cell.textContent || cell.innerText || '';
                    const rateMatch = text.match(/\(([0-9.]+)\)/); // (ì¹ë¥ ) ì¶ì¶
                    if (rateMatch) {
                        teamRates.push({
                            rate: parseFloat(rateMatch[1]),
                            index: index + 1, // +1ì ì²« ë²ì§¸ ìì¼ ë¼ë²¨ ì»¬ë¼ ëë¬¸
                            originalIndex: index
                        });
                    } else {
                        // ë°ì´í°ê° ìë ê²½ì° -1ë¡ ì²ë¦¬ (ë§¨ ë¤ë¡)
                        teamRates.push({
                            rate: -1,
                            index: index + 1,
                            originalIndex: index
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                // ì¹ë¥  ìì¼ë¡ ì ë ¬
                teamRates.sort((a, b) => {
                    if (a.rate === -1 && b.rate === -1) return 0;
                    if (a.rate === -1) return 1;
                    if (b.rate === -1) return -1;
                    
                    if (nextState === 0) {
                        return b.rate - a.rate; // ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì (ëì ì¹ë¥  ë¨¼ì )
                    } else {
                        return a.rate - b.rate; // ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì (ë®ì ì¹ë¥  ë¨¼ì )
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // ë ìì ì ì¸ DOM ì¡°ì ë°©ìì¼ë¡ ì ì²´ íì´ë¸ ì¬êµ¬ì±
            console.log('ìì¼ë³ DOM ì¬êµ¬ì± ìì, teamRates:', teamRates);
            
            // í¤ë ì¬ë°°ì´
            const thead = document.querySelector('#weekdayTable thead');
            if (thead) {

                    const dayHeader = headerCells[0].outerHTML; // ìì¼ í¤ë
                    const teamHeaders = headerCells.slice(1);
                    
                    let newHeaderHtml = '<tr>' + dayHeader;
                    teamRates.forEach(item => {

                    thead.innerHTML = newHeaderHtml;
                }
            }
            
            // ë°ë ì¬ë°°ì´ (ìì¼ íê³¼ ì±ì  ìì½ í ëª¨ë)
            let newBodyHtml = '';
            
            // ìì¼ íë¤ ë¨¼ì  ì²ë¦¬
            dayRows.forEach(row => {
                const cells = Array.from(row.querySelectorAll('td'));
                const dayLabel = cells[0].outerHTML;
                const dataCells = cells.slice(1);
                
                let newRowHtml = '<tr>' + dayLabel;
                teamRates.forEach(item => {
                    newRowHtml += dataCells[item.originalIndex].outerHTML;
                });
                newRowHtml += '</tr>';
                
                newBodyHtml += newRowHtml;
            });
            
            // íì¼ì±ì /ì£¼ë§ì±ì  íë¤ ì²ë¦¬
            summaryRows.forEach(row => {
                const cells = Array.from(row.querySelectorAll('td'));
                const summaryLabel = cells[0].outerHTML;
                const dataCells = cells.slice(1);
                
                let newRowHtml = '<tr>' + summaryLabel;
                teamRates.forEach(item => {
                    newRowHtml += dataCells[item.originalIndex].outerHTML;
                });
                newRowHtml += '</tr>';
                
                newBodyHtml += newRowHtml;
            });
            
            tbody.innerHTML = newBodyHtml;
            
            // í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤í¸ ì¬ë°ì¸ë© - ìì¼ë³ (ë ìì ì ì¸ ë°©ì)
            tbody.querySelectorAll('td.day-label').forEach(cell => {
                // onclick ìì±ìì dayKey ì¶ì¶
                const onclickAttr = cell.getAttribute('onclick');
                if (onclickAttr) {
                    const match = onclickAttr.match(/sortWeekdayByRate\('([^']+)'\)/);
                    if (match) {
                        const dayKey = match[1];
                        // ìë¡ì´ í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤í¸ ì¶ê°
                        cell.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            sortWeekdayByRate(dayKey);
                        });
                    }
                }
            });
        };

        // ê²½ê¸°ì¥ë³ ì±ì  í ë¶ì
        function renderStadiumFullAnalysis() {

            const stadiums = new Set();

                if (stadiumData) {
                    stadiumData.forEach(record => stadiums.add(record.stadium));
                }
            });
            
            const stadiumList = Array.from(stadiums).sort();
            let html = '';
            
            stadiumList.forEach(stadium => {

                let stadiumName = stadium;

                    stadiumName = stadium.includes('ì ì¤') ? 'ìì¸ ì ì¤ì¼êµ¬ì¥' : 'ìì¸ ê³ ì²ì¤ì¹´ì´ë';
                } else {

                }
                
                // íí íì¸
                const homeTeam =

                    stadium.includes('ëêµ¬') ? 'ì¼ì±' :
                    stadium.includes('ì¸ì²') ? 'SSG' :
                    stadium.includes('ìì') ? 'KT' :
                    stadium.includes('ì°½ì') ? 'NC' :
                    stadium.includes('ë¶ì°') ? 'ë¡¯ë°' :
                    stadium.includes('ëì ') ? 'íí' :
                    stadium.includes('ê³ ì²') ? 'í¤ì' : '';
                
                html += `<tr>
                    <td style="padding: 6px 2px; min-width: 135px; max-width: 135px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; cursor: pointer;" onclick="sortStadiumByRate('${stadium}')">
                        <div style="font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold); font-size: var(--font-xs); margin: 0; padding: 0; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">${stadiumName}</div>
                        <div style="font-size: var(--font-2xs); color: #666; margin: 0; padding: 0; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">ð  ${homeTeam}</div>
                    </td>
                `;
                
                // ê° íë³ í´ë¹ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ì±ì  (ììì)
                rankedTeams.forEach(team => {
                    const stadiumData = dashboardData.stadiumRecords[team];
                    const teamRecord = stadiumData ? stadiumData.find(r => r.stadium === stadium) : null;
                    
                    if (teamRecord) {
                        const winRateValue = parseFloat(teamRecord.win_rate);
                        const normalizedWinRate = winRateValue > 1 ? winRateValue / 100 : winRateValue;
                        const winRate = normalizedWinRate.toFixed(3);
                        const totalGames = teamRecord.wins + teamRecord.losses + (teamRecord.draws || 0);
                        
                        // ííì¸ì§ íì¸
                        const isHome = 
                            (team === 'KIA' && stadium.includes('ê´ì£¼')) ||
                            ((team === 'LG' || team === 'ëì°') && stadium.includes('ì ì¤')) ||
                            (team === 'ì¼ì±' && stadium.includes('ëêµ¬')) ||
                            (team === 'SSG' && stadium.includes('ì¸ì²')) ||
                            (team === 'KT' && stadium.includes('ìì')) ||
                            (team === 'NC' && stadium.includes('ì°½ì')) ||
                            (team === 'ë¡¯ë°' && stadium.includes('ë¶ì°')) ||
                            (team === 'íí' && stadium.includes('ëì ')) ||
                            (team === 'í¤ì' && stadium.includes('ê³ ì²'));
                        
                        // íê²½ê¸°ë ì±ì ì ë°ë¥¸ ë°°ê²½ì + íëì í°í¸
                        let backgroundColor = colorScheme.default.bg;
                        let textColor = colorScheme.default.color;
                        let recordColor = colorScheme.default.color;
                        
                        // ì±ì ì ë°ë¥¸ ë°°ê²½ì ë¨¼ì  ê²°ì 
                        if (normalizedWinRate === 0.5) {
                            // ì íí 50% ì¹ë¥ ì¸ ê²½ì°ë§ - ë¸ëì ë°°ê²½
                            backgroundColor = colorScheme.neutral.bgMedium;
                            recordColor = colorScheme.neutral.color;
                        } else if (normalizedWinRate > 0.6) {

                        } else if (normalizedWinRate < 0.4) {

                        // ííì´ë©´ í°í¸ë§ íëìì¼ë¡ ë³ê²½

                                <div style="font-size: var(--font-xs); color: ${textColor}; margin-top: 1px; white-space: nowrap;">${isHome ? 'ð  ' : ''}${totalGames}ê²½ê¸°</div>

                    }

                html += '</tr>';
            });
            
            tbody.innerHTML = html;
        }
        
        // ê²½ê¸°ì¥ë³ ì¹ë¥  ì ì ë ¬ í¨ì (3ë¨ê³: ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì â ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì â ìëìì)
        let stadiumRateSortState = {}; // ê²½ê¸°ì¥ë³ ì ë ¬ ìí

            // ë¤ë¥¸ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ìíë§ ì´ê¸°í (íì¬ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ì ì¸)
            Object.keys(stadiumRateSortState).forEach(key => {

            // ìë ìì ì ì¥ (ì²« ë²ì§¸ í¸ì¶ ììë§)

            const targetRowIndex = rows.findIndex(row => {

                if (stadiumName.includes('ìì') && displayedName.includes('ìì')) return true;
                if (stadiumName.includes('ì°½ì') && displayedName.includes('ì°½ì')) return true;
                if (stadiumName.includes('ë¶ì°') && displayedName.includes('ë¶ì°')) return true;
                if (stadiumName.includes('ëì ') && displayedName.includes('ëì ')) return true;

                return;
            }
            
            console.log('ê²½ê¸°ì¥ í ì°¾ì:', targetRowIndex);
            let teamRates = [];
            
            if (nextState === 2) {
                // ìë ììë¡ ë³µì
                console.log('ìë ììë¡ ë³µì ì¤:', originalStadiumTeamOrder);
                teamRates = originalStadiumTeamOrder.map((originalIndex, currentIndex) => ({
                    rate: 0, // ìë ììììë ì¹ë¥  ë¶íì
                    originalIndex: originalIndex
                }));
            } else {
                // í´ë¹ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ì íë³ ì¹ë¥  ë°ì´í° ìì§
                const targetRow = rows[targetRowIndex];
                const cells = Array.from(targetRow.querySelectorAll('td')).slice(1); // ì²« ë²ì§¸ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ë¼ë²¨ ì ì¸
                
                cells.forEach((cell, index) => {
                    const text = cell.textContent || cell.innerText || '';
                    const rateMatch = text.match(/\(([0-9.]+)\)/); // (ì¹ë¥ ) ì¶ì¶
                    
                    // ë°ì´í°ê° ìê³  "-"ê° ìë ê²½ì°
                    if (rateMatch && rateMatch[1] && !text.trim().startsWith('-') && text.trim() !== '-') {
                        teamRates.push({
                            rate: parseFloat(rateMatch[1]),
                            index: index + 1, // +1ì ì²« ë²ì§¸ ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ë¼ë²¨ ì»¬ë¼ ëë¬¸
                            originalIndex: index
                        });
                    } else {
                        // ë°ì´í°ê° ìë ê²½ì° -1ë¡ ì²ë¦¬ (ë§¨ ë¤ë¡)
                        teamRates.push({
                            rate: -1,
                            index: index + 1,
                            originalIndex: index
                        });
                    }
                });
                
                // ì¹ë¥  ìì¼ë¡ ì ë ¬
                teamRates.sort((a, b) => {
                    if (a.rate === -1 && b.rate === -1) return 0;
                    if (a.rate === -1) return 1;
                    if (b.rate === -1) return -1;
                    
                    if (nextState === 0) {
                        return b.rate - a.rate; // ë´ë¦¼ì°¨ì (ëì ì¹ë¥  ë¨¼ì )
                    } else {
                        return a.rate - b.rate; // ì¤ë¦ì°¨ì (ë®ì ì¹ë¥  ë¨¼ì )
                    }
                });
            }
            
            // ë ìì ì ì¸ DOM ì¡°ì ë°©ìì¼ë¡ ì ì²´ íì´ë¸ ì¬êµ¬ì±
            console.log('DOM ì¬êµ¬ì± ìì, teamRates:', teamRates);
            
            // í¤ë ì¬ë°°ì´
            const thead = document.querySelector('#stadiumTable thead');
            if (thead) {
                const headerRow = thead.querySelector('tr');
                if (headerRow) {
                    const headerCells = Array.from(headerRow.querySelectorAll('th'));
                    const stadiumHeader = headerCells[0].outerHTML; // ê²½ê¸°ì¥ í¤ë
                    const teamHeaders = headerCells.slice(1);
                    
                    let newHeaderHtml = '<tr>' + stadiumHeader;
                    teamRates.forEach(item => {
                        newHeaderHtml += teamHeaders[item.originalIndex].outerHTML;
                    });
                    newHeaderHtml += '</tr>';
                    
                    thead.innerHTML = newHeaderHtml;
                }
            }
            
            // ë°ë ì¬ë°°ì´
            let newBodyHtml = '';
            rows.forEach(row => {
                const cells = Array.from(row.querySelectorAll('td'));
                const stadiumLabel = cells[0].outerHTML; // ê²½ê¸°ì¥ ë¼ë²¨
                const dataCells = cells.slice(1);
                
                let newRowHtml = '<tr>' + stadiumLabel;
                teamRates.forEach(item => {
                    newRowHtml += dataCells[item.originalIndex].outerHTML;
                });
                newRowHtml += '</tr>';
                
                newBodyHtml += newRowHtml;
            });
            
            tbody.innerHTML = newBodyHtml;
            
            // í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤í¸ ì¬ë°ì¸ë© - ê²½ê¸°ì¥ë³ (ë ìì ì ì¸ ë°©ì)
            tbody.querySelectorAll('td[onclick*="sortStadiumByRate"]').forEach(cell => {
                // onclick ìì±ìì stadiumName ì¶ì¶
                const onclickAttr = cell.getAttribute('onclick');
                if (onclickAttr) {
                    const match = onclickAttr.match(/sortStadiumByRate\('([^']+)'\)/);
                    if (match) {
                        const stadiumName = match[1];
                        // ìë¡ì´ í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤í¸ ì¶ê°
                        cell.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            sortStadiumByRate(stadiumName);
                        });
                    }
                }
            });
        };

        // íì´ë¸ ì ë ¬ ê¸°ë¥
        function makeTableSortable(tableId) {
            const table = document.getElementById(tableId);
            if (!table) return;
            
            // ì»¤ì¤í ì ë ¬ì´ ìë íì´ë¸ë¤ì ì¼ë° ì ë ¬ ì ì© ì í¨
            const customSortTables = ['weekdayTable', 'monthlyTable', 'stadiumTable'];
            if (customSortTables.includes(tableId)) {
                return;
            }
            
            const headers = table.querySelectorAll('th');
            headers.forEach((header, index) => {
                // ê¸°ì¡´ ì´ë²¤í¸ ë¦¬ì¤ë ì ê±° (ì¤ë³µ ë°©ì§)
                const existingHandler = header._sortHandler;
                if (existingHandler) {
                    header.removeEventListener('click', existingHandler);
                }
                
                // no-sort í´ëì¤ê° ìë í¤ëë ì¼ë° ì ë ¬ìì ì ì¸
                if (!header.classList.contains('no-sort')) {
                    header.classList.add('sortable');
                    const handler = () => sortTable(table, index, header);
                    header._sortHandler = handler;  // ì°¸ì¡° ì ì¥
                    header.addEventListener('click', handler);
                }
            });
        }
        
        function sortTable(table, columnIndex, header) {
            const tbody = table.querySelector('tbody');
            const allRows = Array.from(tbody.querySelectorAll('tr'));
            
            // ì¼ë° ë°ì´í° íê³¼ íµê³ í(ìíê·  ë±) ë¶ë¦¬
            const dataRows = allRows.filter(row => !row.classList.contains('stats-row'));
            const statsRows = allRows.filter(row => row.classList.contains('stats-row'));
            
            // íì¬ ì ë ¬ ìí íì¸
            const currentSort = header.classList.contains('sort-asc') ? 'asc' : 
                               header.classList.contains('sort-desc') ? 'desc' : 'none';
            
            // ëª¨ë  í¤ëì ì ë ¬ í´ëì¤ ì ê±°
            table.querySelectorAll('th').forEach(h => {
                h.classList.remove('sort-asc', 'sort-desc');
            });
            
            // ë¤ì ì ë ¬ ë°©í¥ ê²°ì 
            const nextSort = currentSort === 'none' ? 'desc' : 
                            currentSort === 'desc' ? 'asc' : 'desc';
            
            // ì¼ë° ë°ì´í° íë§ ì ë ¬
            dataRows.sort((a, b) => {
                const aCell = a.cells[columnIndex];
                const bCell = b.cells[columnIndex];
                
                // íì¤í¸ ì¶ì¶ (HTML íê·¸ ì ê±°) - null ì²´í¬ ì¶ê°
                let aValue = (aCell && (aCell.textContent || aCell.innerText)) || '';
                let bValue = (bCell && (bCell.textContent || bCell.innerText)) || '';
                
                // ì°ì¹/ì°í¨ ê´ë ¨ ì»¬ë¼ í¹ë³ ì²ë¦¬ (ì°ì ìì ëì)
                const columnAttr = header.getAttribute('data-column');
                const isStreakColumn = columnAttr === 'maxWins' || columnAttr === 'maxLosses' || 
                                     columnAttr?.startsWith('wins') || columnAttr?.startsWith('losses') ||
                                     header.classList.contains('max-header') ||
                                     header.classList.contains('streak-count-header');
                
                if (isStreakColumn) {
                    // ììì ë°ì´í° ìì± ì°ì  íì¸
                    let aNum, bNum;
                    
                    if (columnAttr === 'maxWins') {
                        aNum = parseInt(aCell?.getAttribute('data-maxwins')) || 0;
                        bNum = parseInt(bCell?.getAttribute('data-maxwins')) || 0;
                    } else if (columnAttr === 'maxLosses') {
                        aNum = parseInt(aCell?.getAttribute('data-maxlosses')) || 0;
                        bNum = parseInt(bCell?.getAttribute('data-maxlosses')) || 0;
                    } else {
                        // ë¤ë¥¸ ì°ì¹/ì°í¨ ì»¬ë¼ë¤ì ê¸°ì¡´ ë°©ì ì¬ì©
                        const cleanA = (aValue || '').toString().trim();
                        const cleanB = (bValue || '').toString().trim();
                        aNum = cleanA === '-' || cleanA === '' ? 0 : parseInt(cleanA);
                        bNum = cleanB === '-' || cleanB === '' ? 0 : parseInt(cleanB);
                    }
                    
                    // ê°ì ë¡ ì«ì ì ë ¬ ì ì©
                    return nextSort === 'asc' ? aNum - bNum : bNum - aNum;
                }
                
                // ì«ìì¸ì§ íì¸ (ì¹ë¥ , ëì  ë±)
                const aNum = parseFloat(aValue.replace(/[^\d.-]/g, ''));
                const bNum = parseFloat(bValue.replace(/[^\d.-]/g, ''));
                
                if (!isNaN(aNum) && !isNaN(bNum)) {
                    return nextSort === 'asc' ? aNum - bNum : bNum - aNum;
                }
                
                // ì¹-í¨ ê¸°ë¡ ì ë ¬ (ì¹ì ê¸°ì¤)
                if (aValue.includes('-') && bValue.includes('-')) {
                    const aWins = parseInt(aValue.split('-')[0]);
                    const bWins = parseInt(bValue.split('-')[0]);
                    if (!isNaN(aWins) && !isNaN(bWins)) {
                        return nextSort === 'asc' ? aWins - bWins : bWins - aWins;
                    }
                }
                
                // ë¬¸ìì´ ì ë ¬
                return nextSort === 'asc' ? aValue.localeCompare(bValue) : bValue.localeCompare(aValue);
            });
            
            // tbody ì´ê¸°í í ë°ì´í° íë¤ ë¨¼ì  ì¶ê°
            tbody.innerHTML = '';
            dataRows.forEach(row => tbody.appendChild(row));
            
            // íµê³ íë¤ì ë§¨ ë§ì§ë§ì ì¶ê° (ê³ ì  ìì¹)
            statsRows.forEach(row => tbody.appendChild(row));
            
            // ì¢í©ìì íì´ë¸ì¸ ê²½ì° ìì ì»¬ë¼ ìì ìë°ì´í¸
            if (table.id === 'fullStandingsTable') {
                updateRankColors(tbody, columnIndex);
            }
            
            // í¤ëì ì ë ¬ ìí íì
            header.classList.add(nextSort === 'asc' ? 'sort-asc' : 'sort-desc');
        }
        
        // ìì ì»¬ë¼ ìì ë° ë²í¸ ìë°ì´í¸ í¨ì (íì ì¤ì  ìì ì ì§)
        function updateRankColors(tbody, sortedColumnIndex) {
            const dataRows = Array.from(tbody.querySelectorAll('tr')).filter(row => !row.classList.contains('stats-row'));
            
            dataRows.forEach((row, index) => {
                const rankCell = row.cells[0]; // ì²« ë²ì§¸ ìì´ ìì ì»¬ë¼
                if (rankCell) {
                    // ê¸°ì¡´ ìì í´ëì¤ ì ê±°
                    rankCell.classList.remove('rank-1', 'rank-2', 'rank-3');
                    
                    // íëªì¼ë¡ ì¤ì  ìì ì°¾ê¸°
                    const teamNameCell = row.cells[1];
                    if (teamNameCell && dashboardData && dashboardData.standings) {
                        const teamNameText = teamNameCell.textContent || teamNameCell.innerText;
                        // íëªìì ë¡ê³  ì ê±°íê³  ìì íëªë§ ì¶ì¶
                        const teamName = teamNameText.replace(/^\s*\d+\s*/, '').trim();
                        
                        // dashboardDataìì í´ë¹ íì ì¤ì  ìì ì°¾ê¸°
                        const teamData = dashboardData.standings.find(t => 
                            teamName.includes(t.team_name) || t.team_name.includes(teamName)
                        );
                        
                        if (teamData) {
                            const actualRank = teamData.displayRank || teamData.rank || (index + 1);
                            rankCell.innerHTML = `<strong>${actualRank}</strong>`;
                            
                            // ì¤ì  ììì ë°ë¥¸ í´ëì¤ ì ì©
                            if (actualRank <= 3) {
                                rankCell.classList.add(`rank-${actualRank}`);
                            }
                        } else {
                            // íì ì°¾ì§ ëª»í ê²½ì° ììëë¡ 
                            const fallbackRank = index + 1;
                            rankCell.innerHTML = `<strong>${fallbackRank}</strong>`;
                            if (fallbackRank <= 3) {
                                rankCell.classList.add(`rank-${fallbackRank}`);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        }
        
        // ëª¨ë  íì´ë¸ì ì ë ¬ ê¸°ë¥ ì ì©
        function initializeTableSorting() {
            const tableIds = [
                'fullStandingsTable',
                'pythagoreanTable', 
                'clutchTable',
                'homeAwayTable',
                'monthlyTable',
                'weekdayTable',
                'stadiumTable'
            ];
            
            tableIds.forEach(id => makeTableSortable(id));
        }

        // ìë¦¬ì¦ ë¶ì ë°ì´í° ë¡ë
        async function loadSeriesAnalysisData() {
            try {
                const response = await fetch(`magic-number/data/series-analysis.json?v=${Date.now()}`);
                const seriesData = await response.json();
                renderSeriesAnalysis(seriesData);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('ìë¦¬ì¦ ë¶ì ë°ì´í° ë¡ë ì¤í¨:', error);
                document.getElementById('seriesAnalysisContent').innerHTML = `
                    <div style="text-align: center; padding: 40px; color: #e74c3c;">
                        <p>ìë¦¬ì¦ ë¶ì ë°ì´í°ë¥¼ ë¡ëí  ì ììµëë¤.</p>
                        <small>ìë¦¬ì¦ ë¶ì ì¤í¬ë¦½í¸ë¥¼ ë¨¼ì  ì¤íí´ì£¼ì¸ì.</small>
                    </div>
                `;
            }
        }

        function renderSeriesStatsTable(teamStats) {

                const team = dashboardData.standings.find(t => t.team_name === teamName);

                const teamRanks = getRankingSystem().teamRanks;

                teamsWithRanks.push({
                    name: team.team_name,

                                <th class="sortable" data-column="totalSeries" style="width: 50px !important; min-width: 50px !important; max-width: 50px !important;">ìë¦¬ì¦</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="seriesWins" style="width: 30px !important; min-width: 30px !important; max-width: 30px !important;">ìë</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="seriesLosses" style="width: 30px !important; min-width: 30px !important; max-width: 30px !important;">ë£¨ì§</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="seriesDraws" style="width: 20px !important; min-width: 20px !important; max-width: 20px !important;">ë¬´</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="seriesWinRate" style="width: 70px !important; min-width: 70px !important; max-width: 70px !important;">ìë¦¬ì¦ ì¹ë¥ </th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="sweepWins" style="width: 50px !important; min-width: 50px !important; max-width: 50px !important;">ì¤ìì¹</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="sweepLosses" style="width: 50px !important; min-width: 50px !important; max-width: 50px !important;">ì¤ìí¨</th>
                                <th class="sortable" data-column="currentStreak" style="width: 75px !important; min-width: 75px !important; max-width: 75px !important;">ì°ìê¸°ë¡</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody>
            `;

            teamsWithRanks.forEach((teamData, index) => {
                const teamName = teamData.name;
                const rank = teamData.rank;
                const stats = teamStats[teamName];
                
                let streakText = 'ìì';
                let streakClass = 'neutral';
                if (stats.currentStreak.count > 0) {
                    if (stats.currentStreak.type === 'WIN') {
                        streakText = `${stats.currentStreak.count}ì°ì ìëìë¦¬ì¦`;
                        streakClass = 'positive';
                    } else if (stats.currentStreak.type === 'LOSS') {
                        streakText = `${stats.currentStreak.count}ì°ì ë£¨ì§ìë¦¬ì¦`;
                        streakClass = 'negative';
                    } else {
                        streakText = `${stats.currentStreak.count}ì°ì ëë¡ì°ìë¦¬ì¦`;
                        streakClass = 'neutral';
                    }
                }

                html += `
                    <tr data-rank="${rank}"

                        <div style="margin-bottom: 6px;"><strong>ì¤ìì¹/ì¤ìí¨:</strong> ìë¦¬ì¦ìì ëª¨ë  ê²½ê¸°ë¥¼ ìì í ì¹ë¦¬/í¨ë°°í ê²½ì° (ìë/ë£¨ì§ ìë¦¬ì¦ì í¬í¨)</div>
                        <div style="margin-bottom: 6px;"><strong>ìë¦¬ì¦ ì¹ë¥ :</strong> ìëìë¦¬ì¦ ì Ã· (ìë + ë£¨ì§ + ë¬´) Ã 100</div>
                        <div><strong>ì°ìê¸°ë¡:</strong> ìë£ë ì´ì  ìë¦¬ì¦ììì ìë/ë£¨ì§ ì°ì íì (ì§í ì¤ì¸ ìë¦¬ì¦ ì ì¸, ë¨ 2ì¹/2í¨ íì ìë íì)</div>

        let seasonProgressInitialized = false;
        
        function updateSeasonProgress() {
            if (!dashboardData?.standings || seasonProgressInitialized) return;
            seasonProgressInitialized = true;

            const teams = dashboardData.standings;
            const totalGames = teams.reduce((sum, team) => sum + parseInt(team.games_played), 0) / 2;
            const overallProgress = Math.min((totalGames / 720) * 100, 100);

            // í ì¤ì 
            const teamData = {
                'LG': { name: 'LG í¸ìì¤', color: '#C30452', logo: 'lg' },
                'KIA': { name: 'KIA íì´ê±°ì¦', color: '#EA0029', logo: 'kia' },
                'SSG': { name: 'SSG ëëì¤', color: '#CE0E2D', logo: 'ssg' },
                'ì¼ì±': { name: 'ì¼ì± ë¼ì´ì¨ì¦', color: '#1E22AA', logo: 'samsung' },
                'ëì°': { name: 'ëì° ë² ì´ì¤', color: '#131230', logo: 'doosan' },
                'KT': { name: 'KT ìì¦', color: '#000000', logo: 'kt' },
                'NC': { name: 'NC ë¤ì´ë¸ì¤', color: '#315288', logo: 'nc' },
                'ë¡¯ë°': { name: 'ë¡¯ë° ìì´ì¸ì¸ ', color: '#041E42', logo: 'lotte' },
                'íí': { name: 'íí ì´ê¸ì¤', color: '#FF6600', logo: 'hanwha' },
                'í¤ì': { name: 'í¤ì íì´ë¡ì¦', color: '#570D28', logo: 'kiwoom' }
            };

            // íë³ ì§íë¥  HTML ìì±
            const teamProgressHTML = teams.map(team => {
                const played = parseInt(team.games_played);
                const progress = Math.min((played / 144) * 100, 100);
                const data = teamData[team.team_name] || { name: team.team_name, color: '#6366f1', logo: team.team_name.toLowerCase() };
                
                return `
                    <div class="team-progress-item">
                        <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 8px;">
                            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;">
                                <img src="magic-number/images/teams/${data.logo}.png" alt="${data.name}" 
                                     style="width: 20px; height: 20px; object-fit: contain;" 
                                     onerror="this.style.display='none';">
                                <span style="font-weight: 600; font-size: 0.95rem;">${data.name}</span>
                            </div>
                            <span style="font-weight: 700; color: ${data.color};">${progress.toFixed(2)}%</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="team-progress-bar">
                            <div class="team-progress-fill" 
                                 style="background: linear-gradient(90deg, ${data.color}, ${data.color}aa); width: 0%;">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #6b7280;">
                            <span>${played}ê²½ê¸° ìë£</span>
                            <span>${144 - played}ê²½ê¸° ë¨ì</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                `;
            }).join('');

            // DOM ìë°ì´í¸
            const container = document.getElementById('team-progress-container');
            container.innerHTML = teamProgressHTML;

            // ë¸ë¼ì°ì ê° DOM ìë°ì´í¸ë¥¼ ìë£í  ëê¹ì§ ëê¸°
            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                    const overallBar = document.getElementById('overall-progress-bar');
                    const overallText = document.getElementById('overall-progress-text');
                    const gamesInfo = document.getElementById('games-info');
                    const fillElements = container.querySelectorAll('.team-progress-fill');

                    // ëª¨ë  ì¤íì¼ ë³ê²½ì í ë²ì ì ì©
                    overallBar.style.width = `${overallProgress}%`;
                    overallText.textContent = `${overallProgress.toFixed(2)}%`;
                    gamesInfo.textContent = `${totalGames}/${720} ê²½ê¸° ìë£`;

                    // íë³ ì§íë¥ ë í ë²ì ì ì©
                    teams.forEach((team, i) => {
                        const progress = Math.min((parseInt(team.games_played) / 144) * 100, 100);
                        if (fillElements[i]) {
                            fillElements[i].style.width = `${progress}%`;
                        }
                    });
                });
            });
        }

        // íì´ì§ ì¸ì ë¦¬ì í¨ì - ë¹ ë¥¸ ì´ê¸°íë¡ ì±ë¥ ê°ì

        // ì ì²´ ì¬ì´í¸ ìì íì ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨
        function refreshAllRankingDisplays() {
            try {
                // ë©ì¸ ììí ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨
                if (typeof renderFullStandings === 'function') {
                    renderFullStandings();
                }
                
                // í¼íê³ ë¦¬ì íì´ë¸ ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨
                if (typeof renderPythagoreanTable === 'function') {
                    renderPythagoreanTable();
                }
                
                // í´ë¬ì¹ ì§ì íì´ë¸ ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨
                if (typeof renderClutchIndexTable === 'function') {
                    renderClutchIndexTable();
                }
                
                // í/ìì  íì´ë¸ ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨
                if (typeof renderHomeAwayTable === 'function') {
                    renderHomeAwayTable();
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('ìì íì ìë¡ê³ ì¹¨ ì¤í¨:', error);
            }
        }

        // íì´ì§ ë¡ë ì ë°ì´í° ë¡ë ë° ì ë ¬ ê¸°ë¥ ì´ê¸°í
        window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            // ë¸ë¼ì°ì  ìºì ê°ì  ì­ì 
            if ('caches' in window) {
                caches.keys().then(names => {
                    names.forEach(name => {
                        caches.delete(name);
                    });
                });
            }
            
            // Service Worker ìºìë ì­ì 
            if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
                navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(registrations => {
                    registrations.forEach(registration => {
                        registration.update();
                    });
                });
            }
            
            // JavaScript ì¤í ìê° ë¡ê·¸
            console.log(`ð KBO Dashboard ìì: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`);
            
            // ì¸ì ë¦¬ì: íì´ì§ ë¡ë ì JavaScript ìí ì´ê¸°í
            resetPageSession();
            
            // ëìë³´ë ë°ì´í° ë¡ë
            loadDashboardData().then(async () => {
                // ëìë³´ë ë¡ë ìë£ í ì ë ¬ ê¸°ë¥ ì¦ì ì´ê¸°í (ìµì í)
                requestAnimationFrame(async () => {
                    // ì¢í© ìì ê¸°ì¤ì¼ë¡ ê°ì  ì ë ¬
                    if (dashboardData && dashboardData.standings) {
                        await sortStandingsByWinRateAndHeadToHead();
                    }
                    
                    initializeTableSorting();
                    updateSeasonProgress(); // ìì¦ ì§íë¥  ìë°ì´í¸ (í ë²ë§)
                    
                    // ëª¨ë  íì´ë¸ ë¤ì ë ëë§íì¬ ì¼ê´ë ìì ì ì©
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        refreshAllRankingDisplays();
                    }, 500);
                });
            }).catch(error => {
                console.error('ëìë³´ë ë°ì´í° ë¡ë ì¤í¨:', error);
            });
            
            // ì£¼ì°¨ë³/ê²ìë³/íë³ ë°ì´í° ë¡ë (ë³ë ¬)
            loadWeeklyAnalysisData().catch(error => {
                console.error('ì£¼ì°¨ë³ ë°ì´í° ë¡ë ì¤í¨:', error);
            });
            
            
            // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì íì± ìí ê´ë¦¬
            initializeNavigation();
        });

        // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ì´ê¸°í ë° ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°ì§
        function initializeNavigation() {
            // íì´ì§ ë¡ë ì URL í´ì ì ê±° (3ì´ í)
            if (window.location.hash) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    history.replaceState(null, null, window.location.pathname + window.location.search);
                }, 3000);
            }
            
            const navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.card[id]');
            
            // ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ì´ë²¤í¸ ë¦¬ì¤ë
            let isScrolling = false;
            window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
                if (!isScrolling) {
                    window.requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                        updateActiveNavItem();
                        isScrolling = false;
                    });
                    isScrolling = true;
                }
            });
            
            // ì´ê¸° íì± ìí ì¤ì 
            updateActiveNavItem();
            
            // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì í´ë¦­ ì´ë²¤í¸
            navItems.forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    const targetId = item.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
                    const targetSection = document.getElementById(targetId);
                    
                    if (targetSection) {
                        // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ë° ëì´ë§í¼ ì¤íì ì¶ê°
                        const navHeight = document.querySelector('.navigation').offsetHeight;
                        const targetPosition = targetSection.offsetTop - navHeight - 20;
                        
                        window.scrollTo({
                            top: targetPosition,
                            behavior: 'smooth'
                        });
                        
                        // ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ìë£ í URLìì í´ì ì ê±° (2ì´ í)
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            history.replaceState(null, null, window.location.pathname + window.location.search);
                        }, 2000);
                    }
                });
            });
        }
        
        // íì¬ ë³´ì´ë ì¹ìì ë°ë¼ ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì íì± ìí ìë°ì´í¸
        function updateActiveNavItem() {
            const navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.card[id]');
            const scrollPosition = window.scrollY + window.innerHeight / 3;
            
            let activeSection = null;
            
            // íì¬ ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ìì¹ìì ê°ì¥ ê°ê¹ì´ ì¹ì ì°¾ê¸°
            sections.forEach(section => {
                const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
                const sectionBottom = sectionTop + section.offsetHeight;
                
                if (scrollPosition >= sectionTop && scrollPosition <= sectionBottom) {
                    activeSection = section.id;
                }
            });
            
            // íì´ì§ ìë¨ì ìì ëë ì²« ë²ì§¸ ì¹ìì íì±í
            if (window.scrollY < 100) {
                activeSection = 'season-progress';
            }
            
            // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ìì´í íì± ìí ìë°ì´í¸
            let activeNavItem = null;
            navItems.forEach(item => {
                const targetId = item.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
                if (targetId === activeSection) {
                    item.classList.add('active');
                    activeNavItem = item;
                } else {
                    item.classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
            
            // ëª¨ë°ì¼ìì íì±íë ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ìì´íì´ íë©´ì ë³´ì´ëë¡ ì¤í¬ë¡¤
            if (activeNavItem && window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                const navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
                if (navMenu) {
                    // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ë©ë´ì ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ìì¹ ê³ì°
                    const navMenuRect = navMenu.getBoundingClientRect();
                    const activeItemRect = activeNavItem.getBoundingClientRect();
                    
                    // íì± ìì´íì´ ë³´ì´ë ìì­ì ìë¤ë©´ ì¤í¬ë¡¤
                    if (activeItemRect.left < navMenuRect.left || activeItemRect.right > navMenuRect.right) {
                        activeNavItem.scrollIntoView({
                            behavior: 'smooth',
                            block: 'nearest',
                            inline: 'center'
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    </script>

        // íì¼ë¡ ê°ê¸° ë²í¼ ê¸°ë¥ - magic-number ë°©ì ì ì©
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

            window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {

            const shareButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.share-btn');

            // ê³µì  ìµì í ê¸
            shareToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {

            });

            // ì¸ë¶ í´ë¦­ ì ê³µì  ìµì ë«ê¸°
            document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (!shareToggle.contains(e.target) && !shareOptions.contains(e.target)) {
                    shareOptions.classList.remove('show');
                }
            });

            // ê° ê³µì  ë²í¼ ì´ë²¤í¸
            shareButtons.forEach(button => {
                button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const type = this.getAttribute('data-type');
                    const url = window.location.href;
                    const title = 'KBO 2025 ì¤ìê° ììí | 20ê° ë¶ìì§í ìë²½ ì ê³µ';
                    const text = 'KBO 2025 ì¤ìê° ììíì 20ê° ë¶ìì§í! ë§¤ì§ëë², ì¼ë³íµê³, í¼íê³ ë¦¬ì, í´ë¬ì¹ ì§ì ë± ëª¨ë  ì¼êµ¬ ë°ì´í°ë¥¼ íëì íì¸íì¸ì.';

                    switch(type) {
                        case 'copy':
                            copyToClipboard(url);
                            break;
                        case 'threads':
                            window.open(`https://threads.net/intent/post?text=${encodeURIComponent(text + ' ' + url)}`, '_blank');
                            break;
                        case 'twitter':
                            window.open(`https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=${encodeURIComponent(text)}&url=${encodeURIComponent(url)}`, '_blank');
                            break;
                        case 'facebook':
                            window.open(`https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${encodeURIComponent(url)}&quote=${encodeURIComponent(text)}`, '_blank');
                            break;
                    }
                    
                    // ê³µì  í ìµì ë«ê¸°
                    shareOptions.classList.remove('show');
                });
            });

            // URL ë³µì¬ ê¸°ë¥
            function copyToClipboard(text) {
                if (navigator.clipboard && window.isSecureContext) {
                    navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(() => {
                        showCopySuccess();
                    }).catch(() => {
                        fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text);
                    });
                } else {
                    fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text);
                }
            }

            // êµ¬í ë¸ë¼ì°ì  ëì ë³µì¬ ê¸°ë¥
            function fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text) {
                const textArea = document.createElement("textarea");
                textArea.value = text;
                textArea.style.position = "fixed";
                textArea.style.left = "-999999px";
                textArea.style.top = "-999999px";
                document.body.appendChild(textArea);
                textArea.focus();
                textArea.select();
                
                try {
                    document.execCommand('copy');
                    showCopySuccess();
                } catch (err) {
                    console.error('ë³µì¬ ì¤í¨:', err);
                }
                
                document.body.removeChild(textArea);
            }

            // ë³µì¬ ì±ê³µ ë©ìì§
            function showCopySuccess() {
                const originalText = shareButtons[0].querySelector('span').textContent;
                shareButtons[0].querySelector('span').textContent = 'ë³µì¬ë¨!';
                shareButtons[0].style.color = '#4caf50';
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    shareButtons[0].querySelector('span').textContent = originalText;
                    shareButtons[0].style.color = '';
                }, 2000);
            }
        });

        // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ë° íì±í ê´ë¦¬
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.card[id]');
            
            // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ìì´í í´ë¦­ ì²ë¦¬
            navItems.forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    const href = this.getAttribute('href');
                    if (href && href.startsWith('#')) {
                        const targetId = href.substring(1);
                        const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
                        
                        if (targetElement) {
                            // ë¶ëë½ê² ì¤í¬ë¡¤
                            targetElement.scrollIntoView({ 
                                behavior: 'smooth', 
                                block: 'start' 
                            });
                            
                            // íì±íë ë¤ë¹ ìì´í ìë°ì´í¸
                            updateActiveNavItem(this);
                        } else {
                            // í´ë¹ ì¹ìì´ ìì¼ë©´ ê°ì¥ ê°ê¹ì´ ì¹ìì¼ë¡ ì´ë
                            const fallbackSection = findClosestSection(targetId);
                            if (fallbackSection) {
                                fallbackSection.scrollIntoView({ 
                                    behavior: 'smooth', 
                                    block: 'start' 
                                });
                                // í´ë¹íë ë¤ë¹ ìì´íì¼ë¡ ìë°ì´í¸
                                const fallbackNavItem = document.querySelector(`a[href="#${fallbackSection.id}"]`);
                                if (fallbackNavItem) {
                                    updateActiveNavItem(fallbackNavItem);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        e.preventDefault();
                    }
                });
            });
            
            // íì±íë ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ìì´í ìë°ì´í¸ í¨ì
            function updateActiveNavItem(activeItem) {
                navItems.forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
                activeItem.classList.add('active');
                
                // íì±íë ìì´íì´ ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ì ìì­ì ë³´ì´ëë¡ ì¤í¬ë¡¤
                scrollNavToActiveItem(activeItem);
            }
            
            // ë¤ë¹ê²ì´ìì íì±íë ìì´íì´ ë³´ì´ëë¡ ì¤í¬ë¡¤
            function scrollNavToActiveItem(activeItem) {
                const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
                if (navContainer && activeItem) {
                    const containerRect = navContainer.getBoundingClientRect();
                    const itemRect = activeItem.getBoundingClientRect();
                    
                    // ìì´íì´ ì»¨íì´ë ìì­ì ë²ì´ë¬ëì§ íì¸
                    const isItemVisible = itemRect.left >= containerRect.left && 
                                        itemRect.right <= containerRect.right;
                    
                    if (!isItemVisible) {
                        // ìì´íì ì¤ìì ìì¹ìí¤ëë¡ ì¤í¬ë¡¤
                        const scrollLeft = activeItem.offsetLeft - 
                                         (navContainer.clientWidth / 2) + 
                                         (activeItem.clientWidth / 2);
                        
                        navContainer.scrollTo({
                            left: scrollLeft,
                            behavior: 'smooth'
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // ê°ì¥ ê°ê¹ì´ ì¹ì ì°¾ê¸°
            function findClosestSection(targetId) {
                const sectionMapping = {
                    'gamerecords': 'teamdetail',
                    'weekday': 'monthly', 
                    'weekly': 'monthly'
                };
                
                const fallbackId = sectionMapping[targetId];
                return fallbackId ? document.getElementById(fallbackId) : sections[0];
            }
            
            // ì¤í¬ë¡¤ ì íì±íë ì¹ì ê°ì§
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
                (entries) => {
                    entries.forEach(entry => {
                        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                            const activeNavItem = document.querySelector(`a[href="#${entry.target.id}"]`);
                            if (activeNavItem) {
                                updateActiveNavItem(activeNavItem);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                },
                { rootMargin: '-50% 0px -50% 0px' }
            );
            
            sections.forEach(section => {
                observer.observe(section);
            });
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Chart.js ì§ì° ë¡ë©ì¼ë¡ ì±ë¥ ìµì í -->
    <script>
        // Chart.js ì§ì° ë¡ë© í¨ì
        let chartJsLoaded = false;
        let chartJsLoadPromise = null;
        
        function loadChartJs() {
            if (chartJsLoaded) return Promise.resolve();
            if (chartJsLoadPromise) return chartJsLoadPromise;
            
            chartJsLoadPromise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                const script = document.createElement('script');
                script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js';
                script.onload = () => {
                    chartJsLoaded = true;
                    console.log('Chart.js loaded lazily');
                    resolve();
                };
                script.onerror = () => reject(new Error('Chart.js loading failed'));
                // ì±ë¥ ìµì í: async ìì± ì¶ê°
                script.async = true;
                document.head.appendChild(script);
            });
            
            return chartJsLoadPromise;
        }
        
        // ì ì­ì¼ë¡ ë¸ì¶
        window.loadChartJs = loadChartJs;
        
        // Web Vitals ëª¨ëí°ë§ (ì±ë¥ ì¸¡ì )
        function measureWebVitals() {
            // Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
            new PerformanceObserver((entryList) => {
                const entries = entryList.getEntries();
                const lastEntry = entries[entries.length - 1];
                console.log('LCP:', lastEntry.startTime);
                
                // Google Analyticsë¡ ì ì¡ (ì íì¬í­)
                if (typeof gtag !== 'undefined') {
                    gtag('event', 'web_vitals', {
                        name: 'LCP',
                        value: Math.round(lastEntry.startTime),
                        event_category: 'Web Vitals'
                    });
                }
            }).observe({type: 'largest-contentful-paint', buffered: true});
            
            // First Input Delay (FID)
            new PerformanceObserver((entryList) => {
                entryList.getEntries().forEach((entry) => {
                    console.log('FID:', entry.processingStart - entry.startTime);
                    
                    if (typeof gtag !== 'undefined') {
                        gtag('event', 'web_vitals', {
                            name: 'FID',
                            value: Math.round(entry.processingStart - entry.startTime),
                            event_category: 'Web Vitals'
                        });
                    }
                });
            }).observe({type: 'first-input', buffered: true});
            
            // Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
            let cumulativeLayoutShift = 0;
            new PerformanceObserver((entryList) => {
                entryList.getEntries().forEach((entry) => {
                    if (!entry.hadRecentInput) {
                        cumulativeLayoutShift += entry.value;
                    }
                });
                
                // íì´ì§ ì¸ë¡ë ì ìµì¢ CLS ê° ì ì¡
                window.addEventListener('beforeunload', () => {
                    console.log('CLS:', cumulativeLayoutShift);
                    
                    if (typeof gtag !== 'undefined') {
                        gtag('event', 'web_vitals', {
                            name: 'CLS',
                            value: Math.round(cumulativeLayoutShift * 1000) / 1000,
                            event_category: 'Web Vitals'
                        });
                    }
                });
            }).observe({type: 'layout-shift', buffered: true});
        }
        
        // Web Vitals ì¸¡ì  ìì
        if (typeof PerformanceObserver !== 'undefined') {
            measureWebVitals();
        }
    </script>

                this.holidays = new Set([

                    '2025-05-06', // ëì²´ê³µí´ì¼ (ì´ë¦°ì´ë )

                ]);
                
                this.teamColors = {
                    'LG': '#C30452', 'ì¼ì±': '#074CA1', 'KT': '#000000', 'ëì°': '#131230',
                    'KIA': '#EA0029', 'SSG': '#CE0E2D', 'ë¡¯ë°': '#002955', 'NC': '#315288',
                    'íí': '#FF6600', 'í¤ì': '#820024'
                };
                
                this.teamLogos = {
                    'LG': 'magic-number/images/teams/lg.png', 'ì¼ì±': 'magic-number/images/teams/samsung.png', 'KT': 'magic-number/images/teams/kt.png',
                    'ëì°': 'magic-number/images/teams/doosan.png', 'KIA': 'magic-number/images/teams/kia.png', 'SSG': 'magic-number/images/teams/ssg.png',
                    'ë¡¯ë°': 'magic-number/images/teams/lotte.png', 'NC': 'magic-number/images/teams/nc.png', 'íí': 'magic-number/images/teams/hanwha.png',
                    'í¤ì': 'magic-number/images/teams/kiwoom.png'
                };
                
                this.init();
            }
            
            async init() {
                try {
                    await this.loadSeasonData();
                    await this.loadTeamLogoImages();
                    this.processAllData();
                    this.updateDisplay(this.currentDate);
                    this.initCharts();
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('ì¼ë³ íµê³ ì´ê¸°í ì¤í¨:', error);
                    this.showError('ë°ì´í° ë¡ë ì¤í¨');
                }
            }
            
            async loadTeamLogoImages() {
                const teams = getRankingSystem().teams;
                const promises = teams.map(team => {
                    return new Promise((resolve) => {

                            const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');

                            resolve();
